title: Bugsplat
body: I keep constantly getting bugsplat atleast once or twice a day. It always happens in game and on occasion in the loading game screen. Can someone explain why? I tried fixing my client and it didnt work

replies.body: I'm having the exact same issue! every time, after champ select, the client will bug split and crash, dont know what to do!

Bugsplats are an indication that a poor interaction is happening between your hardware and the League Client. This is often caused by a bad system driver or a hardware setting. Working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) is my recommendation, as it covers the most common solutions for this and may resolve this fairly quickly.

Let me know if this helped.
